post:
Reliableweb T/A EAS IT Solutions LTD
Company No. 07954135

​

Reliableweb are please to announce we have launched our long awaited UK nodes and are now able to bring you fantastic offers on our new range of UK OpenVZ VPS. Hosted on Dell Poweredge R210ii servers with server grade hardware, powered by powerful Intel Xeon E3-1230 processors with 16GB DDR3 ECC RAM and SAS RAID protected storage.

Why should I choose Reliableweb?:

- UK Limited Company (Not a fly by night operation)
- Server grade hardware
- SAS storage for blazing fast Disk I/O
- Hardware Raid, Dell H200 Hardware RAID Controller
- Unixbench score of over 5400, Ranked 2nd @ reviews.myhken.com
- 1GBPS Uplink
- Quad Core Intel E3 Processors with Hyperthreading technology
- DDR3 ECC RAM Server Standard
- Large choice of operating systems
- Free management when choosing a control panel
- SolusVM Management Panel
- Instant Deployment!

SPECIAL OFFER:

This week we are offering a generous 20% off of our UK line of virtual servers and we have one special package available as a launch package which are selling quick so ensure you grab one to take advantage of this one time only pricing. To claim 20% off our regular packages use the promotional code VPS20 (doesn't apply to special)

What support is offered: 24/7 support is offered and sales are answered in business hours. If no control panel is selected then your VPS will be semi-managed with basic assistance. Choose cPanel or Directadmin then your VPS will be fully managed.


Are we reselling another provider: No your VPS will be deployed on our own hardware


What Payment Methods do you accept: We accept PayPal and credit cards through 2Checkout or Google Checkout/Wallet


How long is setup: Instantly after receiving payment for your invoice


Any questions please email us at sales@reliableweb.co.uk or alternatively on MSN add sales@reliableweb.co.uk to speak directly in real time.


Thanks for reading and we look forward to working with you!!
